review.title: “Boutique environment, be ready to wear all hats, flies under the radar of many NYC jobs of this type”
review.pros: Pros – Stable workplace, predictable hours and duties, generous benefits, nice office and fast computers. Collaborative environment to a point.
review.cons: Cons – Small office environment - establish your relationships and boundaries with co-workers early and consistently. Occasional late work hours with short notice. Get things right the first time or make sure that you've asked around - mistakes or negligence not tolerated.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Be careful to not combine too many job titles among assistants.
